architecture to enable the application to be deployed on AWS Cloud Responsible for creating an instance on Amazon EC2 AWS and deployed the application on it Used groovy and spring boot to collecting Container ServiceDocker Involved in implementing DAO pattern for database connectivity with Hibernate Involved in writing and implementing SQL queries at the DAO layer using SQL and HQL Designed
